alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Cass; Harrison; Marion; Panola; Sabine; San Augustine; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 10 at 10:14AM CDT until June 10 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 342 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 3 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ARKANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL ARKANSAS UNION IN SOUTHWEST ARKANSAS COLUMBIA LAFAYETTE MILLER IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 17 PARISHES IN NORTH CENTRAL LOUISIANA CALDWELL GRANT JACKSON LA SALLE LINCOLN OUACHITA UNION WINN IN NORTHWEST LOUISIANA BIENVILLE BOSSIER CADDO CLAIBORNE DE SOTO NATCHITOCHES RED RIVER SABINE WEBSTER IN TEXAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST TEXAS BOWIE CASS HARRISON MARION PANOLA SABINE SAN AUGUSTINE SHELBY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ARCADIA, ATLANTA, BERNICE, BOSSIER CITY, BRADLEY, CARTHAGE, CENTER, CLARKS, COLFAX, COLUMBIA, COUSHATTA, DRY PRONG, EL DORADO, FARMERVILLE, GIBSLAND, GRAYSON, HAYNESVILLE, HEMPHILL, HOMER, HUGHES SPRINGS, JEFFERSON, JENA, JONESBORO, LEWISVILLE, LINDEN, LOGANSPORT, MAGNOLIA, MANSFIELD, MANY, MARSHALL, MARTIN, MIDWAY, MINDEN, MONROE, MONTGOMERY, NATCHITOCHES, OLLA, PINELAND, PLEASANT HILL, QUEEN CITY, RINGGOLD, RUSTON, SAN AUGUSTINE, SHREVEPORT, SPRINGHILL, STAMPS, STONEWALL, TEXARKANA, TEXARKANA, WINNFIELD, AND ZWOLLE.
